name: Conor White
story: Lewis joined the army straight out of high school. His family has a long history of service, and he feels privileged to continue the tradition. He excelled in his training, displaying sharp combat and technical skills. He's proud to be in charge of the BLUFOR's air defense, protecting his comrades from enemy missiles. In his downtime, he likes to read about military history, and he's hoping to enroll in college once he's done with his tour of duty.
